structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXIA. OFFICE OF CITIZEN ASSISTANCE AND OUTREACH ("TEAM METRO")

text.section:
Sec. 2-968.1 Definitions.
Definitions of specific terms used in the enforcement of this chapter are incorporated by reference from,Chapter 8,,Chapter 17,,,,, ,, of the Code of Miami-Dade County and the South Florida Building Code. In cases where there are two (2) or more definitions in the Code for the same word, the definition in the Code chapter being enforced shall prevail.
